H0.text: What king is the most-mentioned person in the Bible, after Jesus. Moses

H1.text: What king is the most-mentioned person in the Bible, after Jesus. Abraham

H2.text: What king is the most-mentioned person in the Bible, after Jesus. Solomon

H3.text: What king is the most-mentioned person in the Bible, after Jesus. داود

A4.text: Jesus is described as being directly descended from David in the Gospel of Matthew and the Gospel of Luke.

A5.text: In the Quran and hadith, David is described as an Israelite king as well as a prophet of Allah.
